title: Reels & TikTok
description: Short videos that sell. Increase reach and gain new customers.
content:
In today's world, attention is the most valuable currency. As an experienced content creator, I know that Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts are currently the most effective way to reach thousands of new customers organically.

It's not just about 'filming something'. Social media algorithms are unforgiving. They require dynamics, strict structure (hook, value, CTA), and technical quality. That's exactly what I deliver.

My packages cover everything from brainstorming trending concepts, through efficient shooting (up to 8 videos per day), to final editing with captions and effects that keep the viewer's attention.

title: Creative Production
description: Commercial spots, image videos, and campaigns tailored to your brand.
content:
Every brand has a story. My job is to tell yours in a way that evokes emotion and the desire to buy. Creative production is about building a premium image through the eyes of a professional filmmaker.

Whether you need a TV commercial, a website image video, or a series of product videos, I provide complete service. From initial idea and storyboard, through casting actors and locations, to cinematic lighting and high-end post-production.

I am not just a 'guy with a camera'. I think like a marketer. Video must not only look world-class but must also fulfill your business goals.

title: Event Video
description: Capture the atmosphere of your event. Aftermovies, reports, and recordings.
content:
Organizing a conference, party, or festival? If you don't have a video, it's like it never happened. Event video (aftermovie) is the best tool for promoting future editions and building employer branding.

I am like a ninja when filming. I don't disturb the event, but I am everywhere something is happening. I capture emotions, atmosphere, and key moments. The result is a dynamic edit you'll want to share everywhere.

Besides classic edits, I also offer express delivery of content 'on the fly' directly from the venue for your social media.

title: Live Stream
description: Professional live broadcasting from your events to the world.
content:
Bring your event to viewers worldwide. Whether it's a webinar, conference, or concert, I ensure professional live stream in broadcast quality.

Forget shaky mobile footage. I use multiple cameras, professional audio, and my own direction. I integrate your presentations, logos, speaker names (titles), and pre-recorded videos into the broadcast.

We can stream to YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn, or your private platform. 4K recording for future use is always included.

title: Post-production
description: Already have footage? We'll turn it into a professional video.
content:
Have a full drive of footage from a vacation, drone, or past corporate events but don't know what to do with it? Post-production is where the magic happens.

Deliver your 'raw' data, and I will create an engaging video. I'll edit it to the beat, clean the audio, color grade the image, and add modern graphics.

I also specialize in creating captions for social media and repurposing content – I can cut one long interview into 10 short clips for TikTok.

title: Voiceover
description: Professional voice for your videos. Ads, spots, e-learning.
content:
Visuals are only half the experience. A professional voiceover adds credibility and emotion to your video. You may recognize my voice from ads for brands like Plzeňský Prazdroj, ČSOB, or Oreo.

I have my own professional recording studio, which means two things: top-notch sound quality and extreme speed. I deliver most orders within 24 hours.

Whether you need a 'punchy' voice for an ad, a calm tone for e-learning, or character dubbing, we will find the right style.
